channel.title: How Mariox might help us better understanding Neural Network and learning more about ourselves
channel.description:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/3o0p9udgax2hasl/2015-10-16%2019.52.52%20church%20violin%20and%20unused%20organ.jpg?dl=0 *It's all about the little details*
<small>I'm finding it hard to categorize some posts... This could fit under [tech](/c/buffer/tech), [fun](/c/buffer/fun) or neither! Maybe we need a new one.</small>
Basically, there's a small but quite relevant update on www.basiux.org#details giving hints on what you should pay most attention on Seth's video. Check it out - **click on _Details_**!
From [Thanks to MarI/O, time to focus on ai](http://talk.cregox.com/t/thanks-to-mari-o-time-to-focus-on-ai/7653/14):

item.title: How Mariox might help us better understanding Neural Network and learning more about ourselves
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:


It's all about the little details

I'm finding it hard to categorize some posts... This could fit under tech, fun or neither! Maybe we need a new one.

Basically, there's a small but quite relevant update on www.basiux.org#details giving hints on what you should pay most attention on Seth's video. Check it out - click on Details!

From Thanks to MarI/O, time to focus on ai:

Thanks to MarI/O, time to focus on ai

For some fresh news... I've just updated the website to add a few important markers on the first video, about Mar I/O video. Then again. And again. Probably the most important aspect of that video there is being able to view the missing Neural Network (due to this open issue), or at least glimpse at what it could be if we can implement it mostly unchanged. It's also the most important issue to be resolved, right now, for Mariox. Hope you can enjoy this! []

Read full topic
item.source: How Mariox might help us better understanding Neural Network and learning more about ourselves
